title: Find Second Largest
description:
Given an array of integers, find the second largest distinct element in the array.

If no second largest element exists (for example, if all elements are the same or the array has fewer than 2 elements), return -1.

Implement an efficient solution.

visibleTestCases.explanation: The largest element is 20, the second largest distinct element is 10.
All elements are equal, so there is no second largest element.
